line_1: Dick, this is not an idle Notion:
line_2: Observe the Progress of the Motion.

line_1: Come on, Friend; broach the pleasing Notion:
line_2: I'll be all Night at Your Devotion —

line_1: "But of a garden had no notion."
This reas'ning unhing'd each fanatical notion;
line_2: And stagger'd our saint in his chair of promotion.

line_1: What-e'er might be our Doctor's Notion.
line_2: Is scarce remov'd by Pill or Potion;

line_1: Vouchsafe such grace, that many a transient notion
line_2: May oft within me kindle true devotion;

line_1: A Book indeed, without a notion:
line_2: No system this of deep devotion,

line_1: Perhaps deceiv'd by some fond notion,
